title: 26 companies queue up for KSK Mahanadi power project
description: The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) vacated the stay on the auction of the power project on April 5, paving the way for a fresh round of bidding. The total claim of lenders on the project is pegged at about Rs 32,000 crore. These companies have given 'expressions of interest', which were to be submitted by April 26 and the timeline to give a resolution plan by the interested parties is June 18, according to the timeline set by resolution professional Sumit Binani.
